about_the_game:
Bear the honoured colours of the Dark Angels with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack!

This DLC contains a Champion skin, a cosmetic set, three weapon skins and is available with the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Season Pass.

Champion Pack:

Get a full-body, Dark Angels-inspired Champion skin for the Bulwark class and his Storm Shield.

Weapon Skin Pack:

Receive three Weapon skins for the Power Sword, Plasma Pistol and Auto Bolt Rifle.

Cosmetic Pack:

Over 40 cosmetic items and decals from 8 Dark Angels Successor Chapters. See below.

Angels of Absolution

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Left Pauldron Deathwing marking

- Right Shoulder Pauldron Fire Support marking

- Left Greave Deathwing marking

- Right Greave Deathwing marking

- Left Greave Campaign Badge marking

Angels of Redemption

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Left Greave Ravenwing marking

- Right Greave Ravenwing marking

- Left Greave 3rd Company marking

- Right Greave 3rd Company marking

- Left Greave Campaign Badge marking

Angels of Vengeance

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Left Greave 4th Company marking

- Right Greave 4th Company marking

- Left Greave 5th Company marking

- Right Greave 5th Company marking

- Dark Angels Helmet

Angels of Defiance

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Left Pauldron Ravenwing marking

- Left Greave Campaign Badge marking

- Right Greave Campaign Badge marking

- Left Greave 9th Company marking

- Mark VIII “Ravenwing” helmet

The Unnamed

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Yriel Yellow Colour Pack

- Left Greave 6th Company marking

- Right Greave 6th Company marking

- Left Greave 7th Company marking

- Right Greave 7th Company marking

Blades of Vengeance

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Blades of Vengeance Helm Pattern

- Right Greave Campaign Badge marking

- Left Greave 8th Company marking

- Right Greave 8th Company marking

- Dark Angels Breastplate

Cowled Wardens

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Xereus Purple Colour Pack

- Skullcrusher Brass Colour Pack

- Right Greave Campaign Badge marking (x2)

- Dark Angels Left Pauldron

Bringers of Judgement

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Right Pauldron Fire Support marking

- Right Greave 9th Company marking

- Ulthuan Grey Colour Pack

- Auric Armour Gold Colour Pack

- Flaming Greaves Pattern

content_descriptors.notes:
Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapons to slash/stab enemies.

Strong Language is used in the dialogue.

short_description: Bear the honoured colours of the Dark Angels with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack! This DLC contains an exclusive Champion skin for the Bulwark and his shield, three weapon skins, and over 40 cosmetic items from 8 Dark Angels Successor Chapters.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Czech, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
